page.title: 03BROADFORD PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The headmaster of{Broadford Primary {School}is Mr J.G.Wyness. There are 82 children in the school with 18 going to{Ard Sgoil Portrigh} (Portree High School)in August and 18 new entrants coming in. There is three teachers in the school and also a teaching head teacher making a total of four teaching staff with{composite classes}at P.1/2,P.3/4, P.5/6 and one class at P.7. There is also two permanent kitchen staff and two part-time cleaners. The school has visiting teachers of Art,Music and P.E.with{Gaelic}taught daily. There is three rooms in the main building and one in a portacabin,also staffroom,dining/P.E.hall,G.P.Room/Lib rary and the school Bookshop. The{Gaelic}title of this school is{ {Bun Sgoil an Ath Leathainn. } { }
